definition: system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: Sit down and plan out a strategy for defeating your doubt.
sentences.chinese: 坐下來然後制定一項擊敗懷疑的計劃。

sentences.english: That, in turn, improves the quality of decision making.
sentences.chinese: 反過來，這又改進了決策制定的質量。

sentences.english: Make a self-development plan to acquire the skills and experiences you need.
sentences.chinese: 制定一個獲取技能和經驗的自我提升計劃。

sentences.english: It is also a fundamental tool for the rule laying down policy and law .
sentences.chinese: 它是統治者制定政策與法律的立腳點。

sentences.english: In addition, some laws to forbid any hunting of rare animals should be passed.
sentences.chinese: 此外，人們還應制定一些法律禁止捕殺珍稀動物。

sentences.english: The government already has started planning a three-year rebuilding effort for the areas damaged by the earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 政府已開始針對地震災區制定爲期三年的重建計劃。

sentences.english: The plain white background of the Olympic flag is symbolic of peace throughout the games .
sentences.chinese: 奧運會五環旗是在顧拜旦主持下制定的。

sentences.english: Raj :Oh, we should have a plan in case one of us gets lucky.
sentences.chinese: 噢，我們得制定個計劃以防萬一我們中有誰走桃花運。

sentences.english: The early adopters and trend setters are moving away.
sentences.chinese: 早期的採用者和趨勢制定者正在逐步流失。

sentences.english: France is the first country which past press law.
sentences.chinese: 法國是世界上最早制定新聞法的國家。

sentences.english: In addition, contents of corresponding agreements made by IATA are also discussed in brief.
sentences.chinese: 並簡單介紹了國際航協制定的相關協議及內容。

sentences.english: The specific measures for rewarding shall be separately formulated by the CIRC .
sentences.chinese: 具體獎勵辦法由中國保監會另行制定。

sentences.english: Organize and Formulate Post-Disaster Production and Reconstruction Program.
sentences.chinese: 組織制定災後生產重建規劃。

sentences.english: The government said the agenda will be set through existing working-level contacts.
sentences.chinese: 政府表示將通過工作層面的接觸制定議程。

sentences.english: FINA lays down the rules for international competitions.
sentences.chinese: 國際泳聯負責制定國際比賽規則。

sentences.english: Think short term and long term.
sentences.chinese: 同時制定好短期計劃和長期計劃。

definition: to give a more granular level of detail/to elaborate/to refine/to become more differentiated
to issue/to proclaim/to enact (laws, decrees etc)
to officially launch (a policy, program etc)/to appear on stage/to appear publicly/(of a bar girl) to leave with a client
(of systems, facilities etc) comprehensive/well-developed/excellent/to refine/to improve
to implement/to carry out/to execute/to run
